scripts.build:
mkdir -p dist && [ -f dist/index.html ] || create-html -c bundle.css -s bundle.js | tr -d '
' > dist/index.html && browserify src/index.js -t browserify-exec -p [ css-extract -o dist/tmp.css ] -g unassertify -g [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs > dist/bundle.js && cat dist/tmp.css | postcss --use autoprefixer | cssnano --discardComments.removeAll > dist/bundle.css && rm dist/tmp.css
